td.content: s:a 33 year old f dancer presents with mild nausea, mild heart burn. she has history of mild burning pain in the middle of the chest that usually occurs after eating or when lying down. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily o:Height 166 cm, Weight 57.1 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15, Extremities = no visible veins, pulses wnl a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed RANITIDINE - 150 mg po bid x 4 weeks, and ordered CBC.
